name: Diwali Cracker Boom
description:
Diwali Cracker Boom 

Diwali Cracker Boom is New concept for This Diwali Festival .you can Crack the cracker and Get unlock new level , for a Kids and Game lovers.!


*Game Details : 

=> There are 10 levels. Each level have speed challenges and crush balloons.
=> Each balloons crush 2 point add in score. if you miss balloon score will 1 point minus. 
=> If you crush Dangerous balloon 20 points minus.
=> If you crush Sweet balloon you will get 10 points.
=> there are Some Sweet Balloon , and some Dangerous balloon 

*Features :


- 10 different Cracker Boom with gorgeous HD graphics
§ Tons of unique and perplexing Cracker Boom to play with. Stay tuned for upcoming new ones!
§ Receive bonus reward by completing achievement targets
§ Play with your own pace: Make the jigsaw as simple/hard as you want
§ Beautiful HD picture jigsaws in various themes: Animal, Scenery, Plant and City
§ Completely FREE Diwali Cracker Boom game
§ Easy and relaxing to play, hard to fully master
§ Enjoyable game for EVERYONE: Kid, Adult, Commuter, Girl, Boy, Housewives, Elderly etc.
§ Play whenever and wherever you want: WIFI is not a must for Game
§ Cool Sound
§ Great Graphics

Have a nice play! Enjoy Diwali Cracker Boom !

For more fun check out our other cool, fun and educational kids games for babies, toddlers, boys and girls!

Download and join Diwali Cracker Boom game NOW!
